price: Daabi, εyε wͻn nwanwa sε kͻkͻbͻni fri wͻn ara wͻn mu aba wͻn hͻ. Enti deε boniayεfoͻ no ka nesε: “Woi deε anwanwasεm ni.”
arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bal ʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum faqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā shayon ʿajībun
